ivory.core.data.document
Class TermDocVectorsForwardIndex

java.lang.Object
  ivory.core.data.document.TermDocVectorsForwardIndex

public class TermDocVectorsForwardIndex
extends Object

Object providing an index into one or more SequenceFiles containing TermDocVectors, providing random access to the document vectors.

Author:
Jimmy Lin
